name: setChannelProfile
description:
Sets the channel profile.Sets the profile of the Agora channel. The Agora SDK differentiates channel profiles and applies optimization algorithms accordingly. For example, it prioritizes smoothness and low latency for a video call and prioritizes video quality for interactive live video streaming.
   
       
  To ensure the quality of real-time communication, Agora recommends that all users in a channel use the same channel profile.
  This method must be called and set before joinChannel, and cannot be set again after entering the channel.
returns:
0(ERR_OK): Success.
       < 0: Failure.
      -2 (ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT): The parameter is invalid.
      -7(ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED): The SDK is not initialized.
